attributes.action: Abolish the monarchy and rid us of hereditary titles and the honour system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Surely in 2007 it is time for Britain to finally 'grow up' and become a proper democracy. The government are talking about citizenship lessons but we can never be citizens whilst living under subjection.
We are subject to the monarchs rule. It cannot be right that the only people that can rise to the very top of our society are the ones born into the Windsor family.  Why are Elizabeths children better than anyone elses?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
